articles.author: Helen Pitt
articles.content: Veteran Bluesfesters Annika Tofil and her 15-year-old daughter Giselle Wise from Bateau Bay were in the Byron Bay Lifeline opp shop scouting for outfits when they heard that Bluesfest was cancelled.… [+1568 chars]
articles.description: Bluesfest would have been the first major live music event to return to Australia since the pandemic, and its cancellation two years running has taken a huge toll not just on the live music industry, but the town that has hosted it for 32 years.
articles.title: Everyone has the blues: Reality hits for cancelled Bluesfesters - Sydney Morning Herald

articles.title: Booming rooftop solar growth pushes renewables to 28 pct of energy mix - RenewEconomy
